title: feels in nature's lap!
review: this attraction makes you feel like sitting in mother nature's lap. the sound of birds mixed with waterfall sound make a great aura. love to revisit here if possible.

title: True Nature
review: Mossy fall is one place where you'll not only be surrounded with water and mountain but nature's beauty.

title: Beauty of Nature
review: This Place is awesome from wonderfull nature. its not modified its all Natural water falls  and water tank.

title: a hidden gem
review: really i liked it. i think it is best then kempty fall. everything is natural but road was not good. but for natural photos it is best place

title: Mossy falls
review: A must place to visit when in Mussoorie .. u May avoid the usual Mall Road but a little bit of tracking and reaching the falls will give u a breathtaking experience..

title: Good nature place
review: Best fall which one cannot miss during mussorie tour, we came here by car while coming down to dehradun. Peaceful and natureful place for those people who do not like noise and crowd. Road was small bumpy.

title: Hyped Place
review: A very Calm place. We parked our car before 2 kms as the road are not big enough to take the car. You have to walk 2 kms. The fall is not at all great. A shiv-ling placed near the Fall gets continuously flowing water from the height is the only thing to watch in Mossy Fall.

title: Nice lonely falls.
review: Shiv-Ling Below the continuously flowing water from the height is looking fabulous.Must visit for Nature lovers though its difficult to find the exact location.

title: Pristine beauty
review: This place has somehow retained it's beauty. Feel like home among the mountains and the beautiful pristine fall. This place has not been spoiled as yet as it has very less footfall of visitors... I love coming here again and againwith my family to unwind from the hectic city life. Though the approah road is not too good...I still give this place a MUST visit place.

title: Calm place
review: Mossy Fall is not very easily accessible. If you get to it you'll find a pleasant waterfall which lives up to its name. I liked the fact that we were the only people there to listen to the sound of water tumbling down several levels and then flowing fast through a narrow channel.

title: Cool
review: Lovely waterfall and beautiful voice and sounds of the birds was just fabulous here. Visited by many but very nice place and lot of greenary here. You will have to climb it quite to see this waterfall

title: good fall
review: i heard a lot about kempty fall but could go to kempty so i went to this fall and this is also not bad.i enjoyed this fall. i spend 2 hours at this and worth going once.

title: Road Less Traveled
review: it wad not up to the mark!!
